j8spec

Class J8Spec

  • java.lang.Object
    • j8spec.J8Spec

  • public final class J8Spec
extends java.lang.Object
    J8Spec main facade.

    Note: this class is thread-safe.

    Since:
    1.0.0

      • describe

        public static void describe(java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.Runnable body)
        Defines a new "describe" block.
        Parameters:
        description - textual description of the new block
        body - code that defines inner blocks, like "describe", "it", etc - this code is executed immediately
        Throws:
        IllegalContextException - if called outside the context of the read(Class) method
        BlockAlreadyDefinedException - if another block with the same description in the same context has been defined already
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • xdescribe

        public static void xdescribe(java.lang.String description,
                             java.lang.Runnable body)

      • read

        public static DescribeBlock read(java.lang.Class<?> specClass)
        Uses the given spec class to build and populate a DescribeBlock object.
        Parameters:
        specClass - class with a public default constructor that contains the spec definition
        Returns:
        DescribeBlock object that represents the spec definition
        Throws:
        SpecInitializationException - if it is not possible to create an instance of specClass
        Since:
        2.0.0
